The Athletics hold a team ERA of 4.35 so far this year, and they have struck out 1,134 batters.

The Astros have hit 230 doubles and 170 home runs for the season.

The Astros hold a team WHIP of 1.251 with a FIP of 4.09 as a squad for the year.
The Houston pitching staff have given up 574 runs on the campaign while having an ERA of 3.74.
The Astros have a ranking of 2nd in MLB as a pitching staff in total hits relinquished with 1,084.
The Athletics have a strikeout to walk ratio of 2.37 and the pitching staff holds a collective WHIP of 1.33.
The Athletics hold a team ERA of 4.35 so far this year, and they have struck out 1,134 batters.
The Athletics have sent 466 relief pitchers to the mound on the season.

The Athletics have turned 69.2% of balls in play into outs out of 11,487 innings on the diamond, which has them sitting 21st in pro baseball.
